headline: Dayforce: This Dip Is A Good Buying Moment (Rating Upgrade)
summary: Dayforce is committing to ~15% revenue growth and 100-150bps of margin expansion over the next few years. Read why DAY stock is a Buy.

headline: Dayforce Reports Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2024 Results1
